Name: Stop the War
About the game: Stop the War is a hardcore tactical first person shooter, and your main mission is to eliminate every enemy blocking your way as you advance deeper into enemy lines. The year is 2020, you're stuck in the rural part of South Sudan and you're one of the few survivors defending peace to this day. Keeping it that way will be a challenge. You can either go in guns blazing or play it stealthy, that will be up to your own liking. Stop The War by eliminating all the terrorists and bring peace to our region! Good luck soldier, you will need it, believe me, this ain't no simple task. Game features: -Find hidden weapons -Eliminate the threat -Tactical shooter -Hardcore gameplay -Requires a strategic playstyle
